user_id.description: The unique id of the user

is_impersonated.description: This field is true when a support agent is logged in impersonating a user

is_verified.description: This field is true when user has ID and Address approval

timestamp.description: Timestamp of login in RFC3339 format

origin.description: The origin of the login event

skip_publishing.description: This field is true when the event should not be published
